title.narrative: Ferghana Valley Water Resources Management Phase-I Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve agricultural production in areas affected by water-logging, and to reduce damage to housing and infrastructure from rising ground water levels and salinity in the project areas.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Agriculture and Water Resources

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, A4 | Description: The Recipient shall ensure that upon completion of the works under PartA.3 of the Project the responsibility for the operation and management of Rishtan vertical drainage system are effectively trans |Due Date :31-Jul-2016

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, A5 | Description: The Recipient shall ensure that adequate electric power is availablefor the operation of the vertical drainage system in the project districts. | Due Date :31-Jul-2016

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, C1 | Description: Implement the Project in accordance with the EA, the RPF and the RAP,and shall not amend, suspend, abrogate, repeal or waive any provision of said Plans without the prior written approval of the IDA |Due Date :31-Jul-2016
